title: Lakshmi Diamond & Ruby Floral Cascade Haaram
features: This exquisite haaram features a delicate floral design, meticulously crafted with Polki diamonds in a closed setting to enhance their brilliance. The necklace is composed of repeating flower motifs, creating a flowing, cascade effect. A stunning oval-cut ruby, surrounded by a halo of Polki diamonds, serves as the focal point of the pendant. The setting showcases traditional Hyderabadi craftsmanship with a modern sensibility.
colors: The overall color palette is warm
featuring the rich yellow of 22K gold
the sparkling white of the Polki diamonds
and the vibrant red of the ruby. This classic color combination is both auspicious and elegant.
occasions: festive occasions like Diwali and Sankranthi
and upscale parties. This haaram is a statement piece that will elevate any ensemble.
description: This haaram seamlessly blends traditional South Indian design with contemporary aesthetics. The use of high-quality Polki diamonds and a vivid ruby ensures a luxurious feel. The Hyderabadi polish lends a lustrous sheen to the gold. The necklace is not just a piece of jewelry, but a timeless heirloom to be cherished for generations.
